alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 10 at 11:59AM EDT until September 12 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Lower and Middle Florida Keys. * WHEN...At the times of high tide, from late morning through mid-afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is possible. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys
